attributes.action: Don’t ban dog breeds and start banning owners that aren’t capable of ownership
attributes.additional_details: Dog breeds are being banned due to the way their owner trains them, raises them, treats them etc. it’s not fair that breeds are being banned due to owners not being capable of training breeds or even correctly caring for them!
attributes.background: I would like the idea of dog breeds to be banned to be stopped and for the government and parliament to start blaming the owners of these so called ‘dangers dogs’ to be looked into/investigated and banned from owner dogs.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Remove breed specific legislation. Consider alternative methods for dog control.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638509

Introduce screening process for dog owners
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643631
